name: Have You Seen Me?
description:
Game created over 48 hours during Global Game Jam (Los Angeles) 2016 (Theme: Ritual).

Note: The game is currently not finished and thus contains several bugs. For the list, see here. If you run into unlisted bugs, please fill out this form, or leave a comment below!

When the first criminal in the last three decades trades bodies with you, go on an journey to get reclaim your body.

Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move, Z to hit

  • Features 2.5D, pixel art world with 200+ sprites and combat system
  • Original story, art, and sound
  • Created in Unity

    • Programming - Sneha Patkar, Zach Lower

    Art - Maureen "Momo" Wang, Xiaoying "Sharon" Guo, Jared Dumois

    Sound/Music - Jared Dumois

    Story - Jared Dumois, Maureen "Momo" Wang, Xiaoying "Sharon" Guo, Zach Lower, Ben Kreuger

    Voice - Jared Dumois, John Robertson
